# UITextSearchOptions.WordMatchMethod.fullWord

**Case**

The word matches the search string exactly.

## Declaration

```swift
case fullWord
```

## Constants

- **UITextSearchOptions.WordMatchMethod.contains**: The word contains the search string.
- **UITextSearchOptions.WordMatchMethod.startsWith**: The word contains the search string as a prefix.
